hooks.name: button_pressed
hooks.description: This hook is triggered when the button is pressed.

input_getters.name: get_rows
input_getters.description: Get the number of rows in the pixel grid

input_getters.name: get_cols
input_getters.description: Get the number of columns in the pixel grid

outputs.name: set_pixel
outputs.description: This function will set a pixel to be turned on or off.

row.description: The row of the pixel to set. Rows start at 0 and increase from top to bottom.

col.description: The column of the pixel to set. Columns start at 0 and increase from left to right.

enabled.description: Whether the pixel should be turned on or off
